keys: dispositivo di rimozione dello smalto per unghie

          <title>
            <string language="en">Physical change in a nail varnish remover</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Körperliche Änderung in einem Nagellackremover</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changement physique d'un solvant de vernis 
d'ongle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança física em um removedor de verniz do 
prego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento fisico in un dispositivo di rimozione
dello smalto per unghie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική αλλαγή remover βερνικιών καρφιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambio físico en un removedor de barniz de 
clavo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates an experiment to demonstrate a physical change using a nail varnish remover in a test tube submerged in hot water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">experiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nail varnish remover</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physical change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">test tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht ein Experiment, 
um eine körperliche Änderung mit einem Nagellackremover in einem 
Reagenzglas zu zeigen, das im Heißwasser versenkt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre une expérience pour 
démontrer un changement physique en utilisant un solvant de vernis 
d'ongle dans un tube à essai submergé d'eau chaude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra uma experiência para 
demonstrar uma mudança física usando um removedor de verniz do prego
em um tubo de teste submerso na água quente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra un esperimento per 
dimostrare un cambiamento fisico usando un dispositivo di rimozione 
dello smalto per unghie in una provetta sommersa in acqua calda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί ένα πείραμα για να 
καταδείξει μια φυσική αλλαγή χρησιμοποιώντας remover βερνικιών
καρφιών σε έναν σωλήνα δοκιμής που καταδύεται στο καυτό ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra un experimento para 
demostrar un cambio físico usando un removedor de barniz de clavo en 
un tubo de prueba sumergido en agua caliente.</string>
          </description>
